item.title: Depets Self Cleaning Slicker Brush, Dog Cat Bunny Pet Grooming Shedding Brush – Easy to Remove Loose Undercoat, Pet Massaging Tool Suitable for Pets with Long or Short Hair
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand Depets, founded in 2016, is a professional pet supply brand. We specialize in pet daily necessities, toys, cleaning and grooming supplies. Over the years, we have been dedicated to providing high-quality products and great services to pets and pet owners around the world. Our goal is to ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $15.99 - $6.79
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:39:08 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Depets, founded in 2016, is a professional pet supply brand. We specialize in pet daily necessities, toys, cleaning and grooming supplies.

Over the years, we have been dedicated to providing high-quality products and great services to pets and pet owners around the world. Our goal is to make a better life for pets with every pet owner.

cat feeder, cat cone, cat door

pet supplies

pet toys, pet carrier sling

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9.37 x 5.43 x 2.17 inches; 5.61 Ounces
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Depets
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08FJ655HL

Great Brush, Healthy Pets. The cat grooming brush with round beads can do massage for your pets and prevent scratching your pet’s skin. The design of stainless steel needles with a 60-degree bend and some elasticity is good for preventing skin disease and increasing blood circulation.
One-click Cleaning Button. You just have to Simply push the button and the hair will be super simple removed from the cat hair brush. Furthermore, our dog grooming brush is washable, which can be kept in clean.
Comfortable and Nonslip Handle. Our cat shedding brush is designed with a comfort-grip and nonslip handle, and this self cleaning cat brush also has a massage function for your hand and you won’t get tired easily when you brush your pet.
Enjoyable Brushing Experience. Grooming pets can strengthen communication and further the bond between you and your pets. Our pet brush is suitable for all breeds and coat types. With Depets dog and cat shedding brush, your beloved pet will enjoy the time of grooming.

From a variety kind of pet brushes, I chose this one for my own lovely pets (Yoyo & Yiyi). Every time I brush Yiyi, she rubs my hand and makes enjoyable meow. As for my doggy Yoyo, she always has a happy face when I do this to her. We all love this cat and dog shedding brush, so I want to share it with every pet owner and I hope you and your beloved pet will enjoy it like us.

Washable:Washable feature keep the brush hygienic

Size: 7.7″ ×4.1″(L×W)

Color: blue + white

Material: Stainless steel + ABS Plastic + Rubber

Read more

The round end of the needles can do massage for your pets without scratching his/her skins, which is good for preventing skin disease and increasing blood circulation.

The comfort-grip handle is designed to prevent hand and wrist strain.

Read more

Valuable Brush. This cat slicker brush can easily remove loose hair, shedding Mats, tangled hair, Dander and Dirt of your lovely pets, our cat brushes for indoor cats not only keep your pets clean, but also provide you with a hygienic home environment.

Healthy Pet. The dog shedding brush with round beads can increase blood circulation and keep your pet’s coat soft and shiny.

Read more

Usage

Step1: Brush your pet with gentle move.

Step2: Click the button.

Step3: Remove the hair from the pet brush.

Read more

How to reduce the pain during brushing?

  1. Hold the hair root with one hand, comb along the direction of hair growth with the other hand;
  2. When the hair knots are serious behind the ears and on the neck, the movements should be gentle;
  3. Comb the long hair layer by layer, turning the outer layer over and combing the inner layer.

What if my pet doesn’t like this dog and cat hair brush?

You can guide with snack, lengthen the grooming time every day, our self cleaning slicker brush is gentle and not stimulating, your cute pet will gradually like it.

Note:

  1. Store out of reach of children.
  2. Stress may cause skin irritation, you should brush your pet gently.
  3. Be careful with pets that suffer from skin irritation or weak skin sensitivity.

Read more

4.5
Price: $15.99 - $6.79
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:39:08 UTC – Details)

if (!url) {

var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;

return input.trim();
}
}

The Klein Tools Self-Adjusting Wire Stripper / Cutter takes the guesswork out of stripping solid, stranded, and Romex wire. As the me suggests, this tool features a self-adjusting stripping head for quick, precise wire stripping. It’s especially useful in panels and other places where multiple types and sizes of wire are present. Great for HVAC applications. For more than 160 years, Klein Tools has manufactured premium-quality, professiol-grade hand tools that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Our family of engineers, workers and craftsman continue to put six generations of expertise into every tool we create by using only the highest quality materials, superior workmanship, and keeping manufacturing as close to home as we can. Klein isn’t just the me of our company, it’s also our family me. And since we’re an American company that’s family-owned and family-run, you know you can count on us to be here tomorrow. Klein Tools doesn’t just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professiols who use them every day … Since 1857.
Wire Stripper with stripping head that adjusts to strip: 10-20 AWG solid, 12-22 AWG stranded, and 12/2 and 14/2 Romex cable (all sizes) and other nonmetallic (type NM) sheathed cable
Adjustable stopper to control the length of the core strip
Tensioning thumb wheel allows for precise stripping of smaller gauge wire
Convenient wire cutter in handle
Grooved grips are designed for added comfort
Perfect for HVAC applications because it allows you to strip the outer jacket of thermostat wire and then all the associated individual wires
Romex is a registered trademark of Southwire Company


Read more




About Klein Tools

As an American manufacturer of hand tools for more than 160 years, Klein Tools makes premium-quality, professional-grade tools that deliver performance, durability and precision. Our team continues to put six generations of expertise into each tool by using the highest quality materials and superior workmanship.

Klein Tools doesn’t just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day … Since 1857.

Wire Stripper / Wire Cutter for Solid and Stranded AWG Wire, Heavy Duty Kleins are Self Adjusting

The Klein Tools Self-Adjusting Wire Stripper / Cutter takes the guesswork out of stripping solid, stranded, and Romex wire. As the name suggests, this tool features a self-adjusting stripping head for quick, precise wire stripping. It’s especially useful in panels and other places where multiple types and sizes of wire are present.

  • Wire Stripper with stripping head that adjusts to strip: 10-20 AWG solid, 12-22 AWG stranded, and 12/2 and 14/2 Romex cable (all sizes) and other nonmetallic (type NM) sheathed cable
  • Adjustable stopper to control the length of the core strip
  • Tensioning thumb wheel allows for precise stripping of smaller gauge wire
  • Convenient wire cutter in handle
  • Grooved grips are designed for added comfort
  • Perfect for HVAC applications because it allows you to strip the outer jacket of thermostat wire and then all the associated individual wires
  • Romex is registered of Southwire Company

Read more

FEATURES




Wire Stripper and Cutter is perfect for HVAC applications

Strips 10-20 AWG solid, 12-22 AWG stranded, 12/2, 14/2 Romex wire

Strips smaller gauge wires precisely via tensioning thumb wheel

Read more

1003 1019 11053 11054EINS 11055 11063W
Mfg. No. 1003 1019 11053 11054EINS 11055 11063W
Description Wire Stripper and Cutter Compact Klein-Kurve Wire Stripper / Crimper / Cutter Multi Tool Klein-Kurve Wire Stripper/Cutter Insulated Wire Stripper/Cutter Solid and Stranded Copper Wire Stripper and Cutter Katapult Solid and Stranded Wire Stripper/Cutter

11073 2005N 3005CR 74007 J206-8C J207-8CR
Mfg. No. 11073 2005N 3005CR 74007 J206-8C J207-8CR
Description Blades for Wire Stripper 8 to 22 AWG Forged Steel Wire Crimper, Cutter, Stripper Ratcheting Crimper, 10-22 AWG – Insulated Terminals Wire Stripper and Cutter, Adjustable, for Solid and Stranded Wire Pliers, All-Purpose Needle Nose, Spring Loaded, Cuts, Strips, 8.5-Inch Pliers, All-Purpose Needle Nose Pliers with Crimper, 8.5-Inch

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:41 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Bring Nature To Your Home

We are committed to sharing the joy of gardening and promoting care for nature.

Amazing Creation has a mission of spreading the joy of gardening and promoting a love of nature by offering simple yet modern and elegant, easy-to-use, save spacer, colorful, versatile placement options, BPA free, weather-resistant, and innovative design. We’ve designed our planters to function efficiently in taking care of your plants and nature.

Stackable Planter

Save space by growing vertically. These unique pots are designed to be able to stacked upon one another, saving your valuable space!

Self Watering Planter

Self-watering pot that you can leave for up to 2 weeks. Provides a constant water supply that help your plants thrive.

Round Garden Planters

Featuring a stone blast finish and a modern, round design. Perfect choice for your favorite floral arrangements!

Bamboo Roasting Sticks

Multipurpose 30-inch bamboo roasting sticks, perfect to keep your children at a safe distance from the open flame.

Herb Planters & Roasting Stick

3 Pack Indoor/Outdoor Planters – Feature large water reservoirs and strings that help automatically hydrate your plant life to keep it going strong with hands-free support. windowsill herb garden
Versatile Placement Options – The window planter boxes are perfect for indoor and outdoor gardening. Our planter pots make it easy to grow your favorite plants or herbs, also a windowsill planter
Great Starter Kit – Our planters serve as a great starter set to plant. Our planter pots are designed to support all your planting and gardening efforts. They’re super lightweight, and extremely durable

The Cable Clips are made of 100% silicone, which is non-toxic, non-magnetic, anti-static, and flexible. Once you insert the cable into a slot, it won’t fall out easy at all.
Suitable for holding cables less than 6mm such as computer cables, audio cables, USB charging cables, and network cables.
The double-faced adhesive is very firm and long-lasting and works well in smooth and clean the surface, such as marble, plastic, wood, glass, metal, and rubber.
No more fumbling around on the floor between the sofa and the end table, or between the bed and the nightstand to find the ends of your charging cables.

From the brand

Who Are We?

SUBMATCHES was founded in 2013, Focus on household goods, research and development, design, production, sales, e-commerce operation and industrial chain system construction, provide one-stop home storage tools for people all over the world, helping people improve their living environment, improve the efficiency of living space utilization, and create a warm and comfortable home and office environment

Unique & Creative Organizer

Best-Selling Storage Bins

Best-Selling Desk Organizer

Our Mission

Delivering a sophisticated home lifestyle, enhance the happiness of home life of hundreds of millions of families.

Make Your Home More Neat, Minimalist and Comfortable

Selected the best designers in the industry to find the product design that connects life and art, selected luxury materials, set up high quality and advanced production workshops, and strictly control quality standards.

User Experience Comes First

Create more life experience of user value, continue to meet the user’s pursuit of beauty with creative and unique design, to create a sophisticated life

【STRONG SELF-ADHESIVE DRAWER】 The hidden drawer under desk can apply to various occasions such as office,kitchen, living room, bedroom, study rooms, dressing rooms. Due to the transparent plastic, it’s easy to access whatever you need at a glance. Help to organize your desk and save space. Convenient to clean it as well.
【STRONG LOAD BEARING】The desk drawer attachment is able to bear weight up to about 11lbs and withstand for years of daily use . No worry about falling off. It’s super sticky. The drawers can be repeatedly attached to the underside of desk and slide open/close pretty smoothly.
【LARGER CAPACITY】 The dimension of 2-layers desk drawer organizer is 9.25X7.95X6.1inch, so it can hold lots of items with different sizes, like calculators, pencils, books, smartphones, earphones, cosmetics, forks, underwear, towels, etc. So well to free space on the desk and keep it clean and organized.
【EASY TO INSTALL】 Drill& hole- free self-adhesive under desk drawer is easy to install on smooth wall with two tapes. It perfectly protects your desk or closet from damaging. It arrives with two adhesive strips, press the adhesive tape a bit make sure the tape adheres strongly to the surface.
【SUPERIOR QUALITY】 Under desk drawer slide out is made of environmental-friendly ABS+benzene material and stronger adhesives, it is thickened, wear-resistant, water proof and dust-proof.BETTER USE IT AFTER 24 HOURS FOR BETTER ADHESIVE EFFECT, IF IT WAS BROKEN WHEN YOU RECEIVE OR FELL OFF AFTER APPLY IT, PLS FEEL FREE TO CONTACT US, WE WILL REFUND YOUR MONEY OR SEND NEW ONE.

Production

  • The self-adhesive storage drawer underneath desk is widely applicable in living room, office, study room, kitchen, bathroom, etc.
  • Large capacity with double layers is ideal to hold a large amount of items as you like, easy and quick to grab what you need inside. Perfect to declutter your desk and won’t take up desktop space.
  • Superior material allows you to place heavy items without falling off, durable and sturdy for years, water proof and dust-proof as well. The smooth surface will not hurt your hands.
  • It is a easy and smart way to have a personalized organizing space under desk!

Read more

The hidden drawer pencil tray is very convenient for the underside of the table, paste them anywhere as you need to hold various items.

Bedroom

  • Our hidden self-adhesive drawer helps you organize your underwear, socks and so on.
  • It prevents dust from entering inside, much more clean and healthy to your healthy.

Study Room

  • You can easily spot whatever you want inside at a glance due to its transparency.
  • Greatly save your time to get your work completed.

Office

  • No need digging. No messy any more on your desk or closet.
  • This is a smart way to have a personalized organizing space under desk!

Read more

Large Capacity

With two layers, and even two packs as you need, it can hold lots of items with different sizes, like not only calculators, pencils, books, staplers, notes, but also eyeglasses, smartphones, earphones, cosmetics, forks, underwear, towels and so on. So well to free space on the desk and keep it clean and organized.

Unique Features

Load Bearing Capacity

Our product is able to bear weight up to about 10lbs and withstand for years of daily use .

No worry falling off. It’s super sticky. The drawers can still attach and slide in and out pretty smoothly without issues.

  • [Free Drills] Attached securely and easily! No need to drill holes into the desk with no-tracing pasting.
  • [Easy Installation] Just peel the top paper off and attach. Make sure the surface you’re attaching it to is flat and clean, and the space under desk is spacious enough to hold it.
  • [ high quality] Made of ABS+ benzene material and stronger adhesives, it is thickened, wear-resistant and water proof and dust-proof.

Read more

Installation Step

Step One

(Before installation, wipe the wet, oil, dirt, wax and other items on the desktop before sticking it)

Peel off the surface layer of the tape

Step Two

Paste double sided tapes on the back and press hard on it.

Step Three

Peel off the surface layer of each tape

Step Four

Paste the back side of the tape to the smooth bottom of the desk. Press up a little bit. Better use it after 24 hours for better effect.

Read more
